subcommands.name: configure

subcommands.name: aws
subcommands.description: Configure metaflow to access self-managed AWS resources.

options.description: Configure a named profile. Activate the profile by setting `METAFLOW_PROFILE` environment variable.

subcommands.name: azure
subcommands.description: Configure metaflow to access Azure Blob Storage.

options.description: Configure a named profile. Activate the profile by setting `METAFLOW_PROFILE` environment variable.
Optional named profile whose configuration must be exported.
Optional named profile to which the configuration must be imported into.

subcommands.name: reset
subcommands.description: Reset configuration to disable cloud access.

subcommands.name: status
subcommands.description: Show flows accessible from the current working tree.

subcommands.description: Browse and access the metaflow tutorial episodes.

subcommands.name: pull

options.description: Optional episode name to pull only a single episode.
